syntax:
exclusive data xlist a =
  | XNil
  | XCons { head: a; tail: xlist a }

val rec concat1 [a] (xs: XCons { head: a; tail: xlist a }, consumes ys: xlist a): () =
  match xs.tail with
  | XNil ->
      xs.tail <- ys
  | XCons ->
      concat1 (xs.tail, ys) explain
  end

val concat [a] (consumes xs: xlist a, consumes ys: xlist a): xlist a =
  match xs with
  | XNil ->
      ys
  | XCons ->
      concat1 (xs, ys);
      xs
  end
